byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and BILLY WITZ

lead_paragraph: Kansas City ended a four-game losing streak with an 8-4 victory over the Cubs.

headline.print_headline: Rockies’ Bettis Loses No-Hit Bid in 8th; Hamilton Lifts Texas
headline.main: Rockies’ Bettis Loses No-Hit Bid in 8th; Royals Defeat Cubs

snippet: Kansas City ended a four-game losing streak with an 8-4 victory over the Cubs.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Colorado Rockies beat Philadelphia Phillies, 4-1; other baseball news noted.
